unicef-ecd16.def: Percentage of children 0–59 months old with two or more of the following playthings at home: household objects or objects found outside (sticks, rocks, animals, shells, leaves etc.), homemade toys or toys that came from a store.
unicef-ecd16.name: Learning materials at home, Playthings
unicef-ecd16.source: DHS, MICS and other national surveys. Last update: June 2021.
unicef-ecd16.dataset: DHS, MICS and other national surveys. Last update: June 2021.
